src_original: gos sngon can/_/bskyed nas spyan drangs bstim byas la/_/dbang bskur
mchod pa la sogs bya/_/dgang blugs bstod nas bshags pa bya/_/ye shes
gshegs nas ting 'dzin bsdu/_/yi ge bcu bdun mtha' bsgyur la/_/bdun
nam nyi shu rtsha gcig tu/_/brgya rtsha brgyad du bzlas te bya/_/me lha rdzas rnams
bsdus nas ni/_/cho ga la sogs gong bzhin bya/_/nyi shu rtsha gcig nas bzung
nas/_/stong gi bar du tshhun chad du/_/sbyor ba gnyis po gang byas kyang /_/
ji ltar 'dod pa rgyas par 'gyur/_/thun gsum sbyin sreg sbyor ka las/_/rnal 'byor can gyis brtshon par bya'o/_/rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg gi sbyor ka ste gnyis pa'o//
@#/_/rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya ba ni/_/man+dal kha dog ser po la/_/
khru do khru phyed khru gang du/_/bskor te gru bzhi'am zur brgyad du/_/byas nas
sor gnyis sor bzhi can/_/dbus su rin chen 'bar bas mtshhan/_/bar du me ri'i kha khyer steng /_/rin chen rdo rjes bskor bar bri/_/ser po'i rgyan chas
bgos nas ni/_/byang phyogs ngos su kha bltas la/_/bskyed pa'i rim pa'i tshhul
bsgoms nas/_/las kyi bum pa sbyang sogs bya'o/_/'bras bu 'o ma can gyi
shing /_/kha dog ser po dbus kyi cha/_/thab khung dbus su brtshegs par bya/_/
khru gang khru phyed mdzub gang du/_/dri zhim spangs pa yam shing bya/_/las kyi bum
pas bsangs nas ni/_/mchod rdzas ser po la sogs rnams/_/g.yon du mar
sar zho la sogs/_/me sbar brtag cing thab khung sbyang /_/thab bskyed me lha
bskyed pa ni/_/sde tshhan drug pa'i gsum pa dang /_/gnyis pa lnga pa'i dang po
ni/_/bskyed pa la ni bsngags par gsungs/_/me lha ser po zhal gcig ni//
phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis dbang chen gdan/_/spyan drangs bstims te dbang
bskur ro/_/mchod pa la sogs byas nas ni/_/de nas sreg rdzas rnams ni
dbul_/rtsha sngags nyid la mtha' bzhi ru/_/gzar bu rin chen rdo rjes bya'o//
rgyas par bstan pa zhi dang mthun/_/man ngag nyis skor la sogs kyang /_/zhi
dang mthun te khyad par ni/_/'od zer sna bug zhugs nas ni/_/snying ga dag
tu phyin nas ni/_/lus kun rtsha yi rlung rnams dang /_/byang chub sems ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga
gsal zhing rgyas/_/yang na 'od zer lus kun la/_/khyab pas tshhe dang bsod
nams dang /_/stobs rnams gang 'dod rgyas par 'gyur/_/tha ma dgang
blugs bstod par bya/_/de ni 'bar ba'i rnam pa 'am/_/thugs ka nyid du
